name: Keen Basin Ridge Mid Polar Winter Boots - Women's
categories: Basin Ridge Mid Polar Winter Boots
description:
Strap on your snowshoes and go. These all-terrain winter boots go from door step to trailhead and snowy lookout with confidence. The cold-weather rubber compound remains grippy in freezing temperatures, and the environmentally-friendly recycled insulation keeps your feet warm down to temps as cold as -32C.LWG-certified leather and mesh upper.Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry.200g Keen.Warm insulation is made from recycled P.E.T.Wicking liner with antimicrobial treatment resists odours.Compression-moulded EVA midsole cushions underfoot.Keen.Freeze rubber outsole stays flexible in the cold for traction on ice and snow.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
